resources.string:
Welcome to the brain training game!

 The aim of the game is to improve your maths skills. There will be a series of questions that will test your ability to solve basic equations.

 Each equation will be randomly generated and you will recieve a score based on your ability to solve them, as well as how quickly you do.

 There are four difficulties to choose from: novice, easy, medium, and guru.
 The higher a difficulty you choose, the longer the equation!
